name: Faster Than A Speeding Puppet
description:
Dash through the level by transfering your puppet's speed to yourself !

-------

Guillaume Lefebvre : Programmation & Game Design

Pierre Cilluffo : Art & Animations

Hi !

Here is our contribution to GMTK Game Jam 2021 !

The theme of the jam was : Joined Together

It was pretty fun to make a small platformer !

Even though the game kinda lacks of balancing, we hope you'll still like it !

CONTROLS :

WASD / Directionnal Arrow : Move the Magician

Space : Transfer the puppet's momentum

R : Restart the last Checkpoint

Escape : Go Back to Main Menu
